question: After the outbreak of Covid-19, what is the forecast of Fitch solutions on the economic growth of India for the financial year 2020-21?
explanation:
Fitch solutions of the American credit ratings agency Fitch ratings has recently slashed the GDP growth forecast of India for the financial year 2020-21 to 1.8 per cent.
Indiaâ€™s growth rate was previously forecasted at 4.6 per cent, as per the Fitch solutions. The reduction in the rate is mainly due to contraction in the private consumption, loss of income and slow delivery of fiscal stimulus by the government.
